bfe.title: Large Choice of BFE B/C seats
bfe.desc: The B/C mechanical business class seat offers a variety of comfort features. Passengers will experience a comfortable flight thanks to  generous recline and an oversized headrest.

bfe.title: Define your own level
bfe.desc: AVOD by  Airbus is the most advanced IFE system architecture.  It’s a proven solution that offers unmatched performance and reliability. Provides high-value media content capacity and the ability to offer Audio Video on Demand (AVOD) at every seat, the system ensures that every passenger will enjoy an immersive and entertaining experience while onboard the aircraft.

bfe.title: Define your own level
bfe.desc: In-seat Audio by  Airbus is the most advanced IFE system architecture.  It’s a proven solution that offers unmatched performance and reliability. Provides high-value media content capacity and the ability to offer In-seat Audio at every seat, the system ensures that every passenger will enjoy an immersive and entertaining experience while onboard the aircraft.

bfe.title: Define your own level
bfe.desc: Overhead video by  Airbus is the most advanced IFE system architecture.Its modular design can simultaneously support overhead, in-seat distributed and on-demand content distribution on a single aircraft. This approach  accommodates maximum fleet commonality, installation flexibility and future upgrade potential.

bfe.title: Large Choice of BFE B/C seats
bfe.desc: In Seat Power by  Airbus is one of the most technologically advanced aircraft in-seat power and cabin power management systems. The product is designed to guarantee airline passengers sufficient power to use their personal electronic devices, including laptops, smartphones and tablets, while in flight.

bfe.title: RECARO  3530Swift The Airbus SFE Seat Offer
bfe.desc: Secure a seat solution for all customers, as alternative to BFE catalogue options:whatever the fleet size in line fit and retrofit with short ordering lead-time (CDF in line fit, 4 months in retrofit)
